title: Hong Kong protests: Police officer wounded with arrow at campus stand-off
content: Police have warned protesters that they may use live bullets if violence against officers continues.

title: Sri Lanka election: Wartime defence chief Rajapaksa wins presidency
content: Gotabaya Rajapaksa is declared the winner in a poll that has split the country along ethnic lines.

title: Trump defends Biden over North Korea's 'rabid dog' jibe
content: In a surprising tweet, Donald Trump suggests North Korea's rant against Joe Biden went too far.

title: US election 2020: Democrats respond to Obama's warning
content: Some call for party unity while others defend their policies as Barack Obama's remarks fuel debate.

title: Venice floods: Further warnings of high tides
content: Large parts of the centre of the Italian city have been hit by exceptionally high tides for the third time in a week.

title: Australian politicians banned from China 'will not repent' for criticism
content: Andrew Hastie and James Paterson have refused to "repent" for their criticism of the country.

title: Artist will.i.am accuses Qantas flight attendant of racism
content: The US musician was met by police at Sydney airport after a disagreement with a flight attendant.

title: Sri Lanka election: Unity hard to achieve in divided country
content: Minorities fearful as controversial ex-defence secretary Gotabaya Rajapaksa is elected president.

title: Panorama Investigation: War crimes scandal exposed
content: British Special Forces have been accused of covering up the killings of four young Afghans in 2012.
